title: Strengthening App Development Competencies: Online Argumentation-Based Science Concept Inquiry Learning

context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze and critically evaluate scientific concepts during argumentation-based interactive processes.
Learners can improve their conceptual understanding of diffusion phenomena by more than 80% through collaborative argumentation activities.
Learners can present their arguments about scientific concepts in a structured form through project deliverables.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
